About.head: Working and traveling at the same time ‚Äì
About.body: I can understand why this question arises when people come across my profile. For me, however, the answer is very clear. It's not a question of either/or, but rather that both are integral parts of my life. If I were to question this decision, I would have to ask myself the fundamental question: ‚ÄúHow does life work?‚Äù ‚Äì and that is precisely what I answered for myself when I took the step into self-employment.

Travels.head: My Leap into the Digital Nomad Life
Travels.body: Right now, my travels are taking me across Southeast Asia ‚Äì from bustling street food markets in Bangkok to stunning dive spots in Malaysia and the tropical islands of Indonesia. Every place surprises me with new impressions, warm encounters, and an incredible diversity of food, cultures, and lifestyles.
Travels.subbody: What this journey has shown me? How much you can learn when you‚Äôre open to new perspectives, unfamiliar habits, and spontaneous adventures.

Travels.head: Time Off in Portugal
Travels.body: After I had decided to work as a digital nomad and travel the world, I made all the necessary preparations at home to embark on this journey. But before the time was to come, I wanted to travel once more without any professional obligations. I chose to spend 14 days traveling through Portugal. Just me, my small backpack, and the breathtaking Portuguese coastline.
Travels.subbody: At the end of this journey, I was only more certain of my plans.

Travels.head: Vietnam ‚Äì Where It All Began
Travels.body: My first long-distance journey took me to Vietnam. Within a month, I traveled the country from south to north, gaining insight into a breathtaking culture surrounded by friendly people and picturesque landscapes. My journey through Vietnam ultimately led me to work as a digital nomad and travel the world.
Travels.subbody: It is safe to say that without this trip, I would not be where I am today.
